articles.title: What Don Sweeney said about the Bruins’ playoff odds, timeline for new captain

articles.title: North Andover officer shot by colleague released from jail
articles.description:
Kelsey Fitzsimmons faces one charge of assault with a dangerous weapon. She was released on house arrest and ordered to not see her infant son.

summary: North Andover officer Kelsey Fitzsimmons was released from jail on house arrest.

She is prohibited from seeing her infant son during house arrest.
